column2:
"Confirmed a large number
of heat sources. Please,
proceed with caution."

"Detecting a high density of
geomagnetic fluctuations.
Please, prepare for contingencies."

"Detected a large number of moving targets!
Please be on the lookout nearby!"

"We're picking up a large number of readings!
Please, pay attention to your surroundings!"

"Picking up a large number of readings!
Please, be extra careful in this area!"

"We're getting readings from a
target we need to investigate!"

"Confirmed readings from a target
we need to investigate. Please,
be aware of contingencies!"

"A target we need to investigate
may be lurking in the vicinity.
Please, bear this in mind."

"An extremely powerful heat
source has been detected!
Please, be careful!"

"Confirmed strange heat
source readings! Don't
let your guard down!"

"A powerful heat source
is approaching! Please,
pay attention!"
"There seem to be ARKS engaged in combat in the nearby area."
"ARKS appear to be engaged in battle in the area."
"Combat readings? There seem to be ARKS in the area..."
"/face6 What are these tiny readings...?"

"/face6 I wonder what these
tiny readings are...?"

"It might be my imagination, but
we've confirmed tiny readings."

"The photon factor is
climbing! Beware of Darkers!"

"Environmental patterns are on the
rise! Please, be cautious of Darkers!"

"Spacial pattern estimates are
fluctuating! Beware of Darkers!"

"Something is odd about
this enemy activity.
Please, take care."

"Something strange is going
on amongst the enemy forces.
Please, bear this in mind."

"There's something strange
about this enemy activity.
Something might be happening."

"System malfunctions detected!
Be aware of malfunctioning
defense equipment!"

"Error code detected!
Please be mindful of
malfunctions and the like!"

"Abnormal behavior has been
confirmed! Pay attention to the
behavior of defense equipment too!"

"Some spots around here
don't have a stable footing.
Please, watch your step."
"Fittingly enough, some of the Skyscape area's footing seems to be unstable."

"Be sure to keep track of both your
location and that of stable ground."
"It seems this area is similar to the Skyscape area."
"I'm getting abnormal readings from the flooring here."

"/face6 それにしても、不思議な惑星です。
どうしてこんな岩が宙に浮かんで
いられるのでしょう"
"I've picked up indications of rare insect fossils in the area."

"We have intel that suggests unusual
insect fossils are around here, but..."

"There are lots of insect fossils
in this area, so numerous survey
missions are being carried out."

"These readings are all over
the place... Just what is this?
Something feels wrong here."

"Strange readings all over the
place... What on earth is this?"

"These readings are odd...
They're small... For Darkers."

"There are many valuable
resources in this area."

"/face2 さすがは資源の豊富な惑星ですね。
各所に顕著な反応があります。"

"We're getting readings
from resources, just
like the rumors said."

"Detected photon readings nearby.
Seems to be coming from the ground."

"Photon readings nearby.
I think... from the ground?"

"There's photon readings in the area.
They're coming from the ground."

"Seems like the equipment around
you is still functioning. Please,
don't let your guard down."

"The equipment here is still
functioning. Watch out for
things happening around you."

"Confirmed that equipment is
operational. Please, be careful."

"Readings from targets to
capture have been detected!"

"Spotted readings from
targets to capture!"

"Getting readings
from targets to
capture nearby!"

"Spotted an unknown heat
source! Please take care!"

"Confirmed unidentified heat
source! Please pay attention!"

"There's an unidentified
heat source present!
Please be careful!"
"It seems that recently there have been reports of Lillipans directly interacting with ARKS."
"Speaking of which, I wonder how Lillipans communicate..."
"My subordinates are looking into it, but there's still a lot we don't know about the Lillipans."
"Your destination is beyond that gate, but it appears to be under Darker influence."
"The portal to the next area is up ahead. Be careful, I'm picking up strong enemy readings."
"The portal is close, but something doesn't seem right. Be careful."
"The coast area has many shell flowers. How these strange plants came to evolve is entirely unknown."
"The shell flowers scattered throughout the area behave differently between night and day. Be careful."
"The shell flowers are quite strange. It's hard to believe such things can occur naturally."
"Lillipan settlements have been confirmed in the vicinity of the abandoned quarry."
"Water sources have also been confirmed in the vicinity of the abandoned quarry. That must be why the Lillipans made their settlements here."
"The mechs seem to attack the Lillipan settlements often. If you encounter any settlements under attack, please lend them aid."
"A lot of junk seems to be scattered throughout the area."
"It's common to see Lillipans scavenging in the junk. I wonder what they're looking for."
"Maybe all this junk that's useless to us is precious to the Lillipans."

"/face1 原生住民が近くにいるようですね。
何をしているんでしょうか。"

"/face1 このあたりには、原生住民にとっての
天敵も存在しているようですね。
だからあまり近寄らないとか。"

"/face1 この反応……もしかして
周囲に原生住民がいませんか？"

"/face1 不定形の生物が固まって
落ちてくる場所があるようです。"

"/face1 不定形の生物というのも
珍しいものですね。"

"/face1 生物の反応があります。
これは、空中に何か不定形の……？"

"アークスが近くにいるようです。
反応がちょっとヘンな気がしますが……"

"アークスが近くにいるようです。
反応がちょっとヘンな気がしますが……"

"近辺にアークスの反応が二つあります。
パーティを組んでいるようですが
少し、反応がヘンな気も……"

"……いえ、気のせいみたいです。
そのまま進行し、可能であれば
協力してあげてください。"
"Variation Test1"
"Variation Test2"
"Variation Test3"
"It's weak, but we've confirmed an enemy reaction. The Shironians seem to be preparing to sortie. Please be careful."
"It's weak, but we've confirmed an enemy reaction. The Shironians are also on alert. Everyone, be aware of changes in the situation."
"We've confirmed a weak enemy reaction. The Shironians seem to be on the move. Everyone, please be careful."

"この反応は……なんでしょう。
不思議なパターンが確認されています。
一応、警戒をお願いします。"

"正体不明の反応があります。
Darkersではないようですが……
一応、留意しておいてください。"

"出たり消えたり、不思議な反応が
確認されています。
一応、気をつけてください。"
"Variation Test1"
"Variation Test2"
"Variation Test3"
"テスト１"
"テスト２"
"テスト３"

"We're detecting someone nearby.
It seems humanoid...
but not quite like an ARKS operative...?"

"この付近に戦闘中と思われる
アークスの反応があります。"

"エリア周辺に反応を検知しました。
交戦中のアークスが居るようです。"

"周囲に反応あり。
交戦中のアークスのようです。"

"この付近に戦闘中と思われる
アークスの反応があります。"

"エリア周辺に反応を検知しました。
交戦中のアークスが居るようです。"

"周囲に反応あり。
交戦中のアークスのようです。"

"近辺にアークスの反応が二つあります。
パーティを組んでいるようですが
少し、反応がヘンな気も……"

"周辺で多数の雷鳴を観測しました。
状況に合わない異常な数値です！
警戒を怠らないでください。"

"強力な放電現象を探知しました。
黒の民と関係があるかもしれません。
周辺に注意してください！"

"非常に強い電場の発生を感知！
周囲への警戒を強めてください！"

"近辺にアークスの反応が二つあります。
パーティを組んでいるようですが
少し、反応がヘンな気も……"

"近辺にアークスの反応が二つあります。
パーティを組んでいるようですが
少し、反応がヘンな気も……"

"敵性反応とは違う反応を確認。
巨影の目撃情報も来ています。
周辺に注意してください！"

"There's a great number of moving heat sources.
Don't get careless now."

"Detecting a large number of moving heat sources.
Watch yourselves."

"Confirmed a large number of readings.
Be on the lookout."

"Got readings from a target
we need to investigate. Be
alert, it might show up."

"Confirmed readings from a target
we need to investigate. I'll contact
you again when I know the details."

"I've come across readings from a
target we need to investigate. Keep
a close eye on events around you."

"We've confirmed a strange heat
source. Be careful, it's huge."

"Confirmed readings from a strange
heat source. This thing's huge!"

"Getting powerful heat source
readings from this thing. Don't
let your guard down, this is huge."
"This signal... Are there other ARKS?"

"There are signs of battle in the surrounding area.
Other ARKS might be around somewhere."

"Are other ARKS engaged in combat?
Be careful, just in case."
"What are these tiny readings?"

"These readings... A person?
It can't be something small then."

"I don't think I'm imagining this...
Just what are these tiny readings?"

"These spacial pattern
estimates... Darkers?"

"Hmm... the signs are pointing
to a Darker outbreak."

"Environmental patterns
are changing... are
Darkers inbound?"

"There's odd enemy activity...
Be careful, just in case."

"Enemy activity is strange.
Don't let your guard down."

"Getting strange enemy readings...
Something might be up, stay vigilant."

"Tch, the system's broke
down? Careful, defense
systems are malfunctioning."

"A system error... What a pain.
Pay attention to the behaviour
of the defense systems."

"... System's destabilized. Watch out
for defense system activity."
"Normal common sense doesn't work in the Skyscape. Watch where you step."

"Anything can happen around here.
Footing's not stable either. Careful."

"Be careful, it looks like even more
of the ground is likely to fall away."
"This place seems as unstable as the rest of the Skyscape. Watch your footing."
"Be careful! Just like the Skyscape, the flooring can give way any time."
"The floors are unstable here. The fall won't be bad, but please be careful."

"Oh, yes, come to think of it,
there appear to be rare insect
fossils or something in the area."

"Did you know? Unusual insect
fossils or something appear to
have been discovered in the area."

"Looks like there are occasional
surveys searching for things like
rare insect fossils around here."

"The readings are going
to pieces... What the...?
Is its body breaking apart?"

"Getting strange readings here
and there. Are they... Darkers?
No, they're smaller than that."

"Strange readings all over the
place. Are these things carrying
something? What is it?"

"Hmm, this planet is indeed rich in
resources. These valuable resource
readings are really something."

"Looks like there's a motherlode
of valuable resources just
lying around in the vicinity."

"These readings... they're not
enemies. I see... we've collected
some valuable resources!"

"Detected photon readings in the
area. Seems to be from the ground."

"Photon readings detected nearby.
They're coming from the ground."

"Confirmed photon readings close
by... I see, they're from the ground."

"There's readings from
equipment nearby. Careful,
still seems operational."

"The readings from this equipment...
Be careful, and proceed with caution."

"The equipment still seems to be
running. Pay attention. You might
get dragged into something here."

"Detecting readings from
targets we want to capture.
I'll track down the details."

"Confirmed readings from
targets we want to capture.
They might be in the area."

"These readings... they're coming
from close by. Might be from
targets we'd like you to capture."

"Detecting an unknown heat
source. How odd... watch out."

"Confirmed an unknown heat source.
... Careful, something's strange here."

"There's an unidentified
heat source present...
Is someone there?"
"It seem there have been lots of reports of Lillipans directly interacting with ARKS lately."
"Speaking of which, I wonder how Lillipans communicate..."

"/face6 リリーパ族、か。
どんな経緯でこの星に
住み始めたのだろう。"
"I'm detecting a portal nearby. ...Strong Darker responses are increasing!"
"The way to the next area is up ahead. Darker responses are increasing as well."
"I'm picking up a lot of Dragonkin. Careful, the gate is also under the influence of Darkers."
"The coast area has many mysterious plant-like objects called shell flowers."
"The shell flowers change their behavior between night and day. If you're clever, it's possible to use them to hurt hostiles too."
"I don't think these flowers are natural. They look almost as if they've been twisted from their original form."
"This should definitely be the area where the Lillipans established settlements."
"The Lillipans must have settled here because there's water in the area. It seems water is truly precious on this planet."
"There are a few reports of a certain monument in the area. It seems to be a some kind of symbol to the Lillipans, though we don't know what it means to them."
"Everything scattered throughout the area... it's all just junk."
"All the junk in this area must look like mountains of treasure to the Lillipans."
"Recently, there have been many reports of raids on the Lillipans. Help them as much as you can."

"/face1 このあたりには、かの原生住民の
天敵が存在するらしいな。"

"/face1 周囲にあるこの反応……
原生住民のようだが
何をしているんだ。"

"/face1 もし、襲われている原生住民を
見かけたら、助けてやれ。
それもアークスの責務だ。"

"/face1 これは……不定形生物の反応か？
周辺を警戒しろ。"

"/face1 奇妙な反応が出ている。
周囲状況をしっかり確認しろ。"

"/face1 不安定な反応があるな……
気をつけろ、来るかもしれないぞ。"

"We're detecting nearby ARKS. However,
the energy reading feels off...
Keep your guard up."

"We're detecting nearby ARKS. However,
the energy reading feels off...
Please keep in mind."

"近辺にアークスの反応が二つあります。
パーティを組んでいるようですが
少し、反応がヘンな気も……"

"……いえ、気のせいみたいです。
そのまま進行し、可能であれば
協力してあげてください。"

"パラメータに異常値……？
街に存在する灯籠からか？
気をつけろ、何かあるぞ。"

"街の灯籠の周囲に異常反応を確認。
……各員、警戒しろ。
何が起きるかわからんぞ。"

"各員、周囲を警戒しろ。
まだ影響はないようだが、街の灯籠に
異常な反応が集まっている。"
"Enemy reaction is increasing. The Shironians are preparing to sortie. Everyone, be ready to meet them."
"Enemy reaction confirmed. Something may be approaching. Be wary. The Shironians are also on alert."
"The Shironians seem to be on the move. Do you sense an enemy reaction...? Be careful out there."

"不可思議な反応だな……
敵性反応とも、味方の反応とも言えん。
一応、警戒はしておくといい。"

"反応は出ているのだが……
なんともいえん、変な反応だ。
留意だけはしておけ。"

"付近で、変な反応が確認された。
変、としか言いようのない反応だ。
各員、一応気をつけておけ。"

"海中に高エネルギー反応を感知。
何か出てくるかもしれないぞ。
各員、警戒を怠るな。"

"海中に高エネルギー反応を感知。
何か出てくるかもしれないぞ。
各員、警戒を怠るな。"

"海中に高エネルギー反応を感知。
何か出てくるかもしれないぞ。
各員、警戒を怠るな。"

"何が潜んでいるのか……？
強力な反応が確認されている。
各員、気を付けて動け。"

"何が潜んでいるのか……？
強力な反応が確認されている。
各員、気を付けて動け。"

"何が潜んでいるのか……？
強力な反応が確認されている。
各員、気を付けて動け。"

"周囲に人の反応を感知……
だが、アークスとは異なるか？
一応、留意しておけ。"

"周囲にアークスの反応を感知……
戦闘中のようだな。
一応、留意しておけ。"

"交戦中のアークスがいるようだな。
周辺に反応がある。
念のため、留意しておけ。"

"アークスの反応を感知した。
周辺で戦闘中のようだ。注意しておけ。"

"周囲にアークスの反応を感知……
戦闘中のようだな。
一応、留意しておけ。"

"交戦中のアークスがいるようだな。
周辺に反応がある。
念のため、留意しておけ。"

"アークスの反応を感知した。
周辺で戦闘中のようだ。注意しておけ。"

"近くにアークスの反応が二つあるな。
パーティを組んでいるようだが……
どうも妙な感じがするな。"

"光源の明滅現象を確認した。
黒の民の動きにも違和感がある。
各員、警戒を怠るなよ。"

"光源が作為的に消されているようだな。
現段階での目的は不明だが、意味のない
動きではなさそうだ。油断するなよ。"

"黒の民の動きが妙だな……
光源低下と関係があるかもしれん。
各員、注意しておけ。"

"近くにアークスの反応が二つあるな。
パーティを組んでいるようだが……
どうも妙な感じがするな。"

"近くにアークスの反応が二つあるな。
パーティを組んでいるようだが……
どうも妙な感じがするな。"

"敵性反応ではない反応を検知した。
周辺で巨大な影の目撃報告もきている。
注意を怠るなよ。"

"We're seeing many moving readings!
Please be careful!"

"Umm, there's a lot of readings?
Be careful, be really careful!"

"T-these readings! Something's heading this way!
...Probably!"

"/face2 調査対象の反応びんびんです！
これは来ちゃう！\u3000来ちゃうかも！"

"/face2 おおっ、これはいいですよー！
調査対象の反応があります！"

"/face2 いーい反応出てますよー！
調査対象さん、そのまま来て－！"

"Wow, what an incredible heat
source! P-please be careful!"

"What... What are these readings?
They're incredibly... hot...!"

"This heat source sure
is strange! Please
be extra careful!"

"Hmm... what's this? This signal...
There's someone nearby, possibly?"
"What's this, other ARKS? Maybe they're somewhere close by."
"Are there other ARKS nearby? This signal looks like the real deal!"

"Mm... I wonder what these
tiny little readings are..."

"Oh... What's this? How
strange, I thought I saw
some tiny readings..."

"Mmm... some tiny
readings appeared
and vanished just now..."

"Waaa... these readings,
they're Darkers?"

"Something maybe might be
coming! A great darkness!"

"This is similar to Darkers...
But, not quite like them..."

"Mmm, enemy activity
sure is strange..."

"There's been some suspicious
movement... please be a bit careful."

"I've got a bit of a bad feeling
about this. Please be careful!"

"Wow, the system's
in bad shape... Watch
out for malfunctions!"

"Gah... why can't we control it?
Be mindful of your surroundings!"

"Huh? Huhhh? Huhhhhhhh? I-it may
be malfunctioning or something!"

"Wow, this is really scary!
Please be careful!"

"What the!? The ground over there
seems to be moving on its own!"

"Huh? Didn't we see a landmass
just like that a while back...?"
"Huh? I'm getting a massive reading here!"

"/face2 ま、また勝手に動く足場ですー！
まるでアトラクション！"
"What? There was a strange blip on the map. Something may have changed."

"/face2 Hehe, what do we have here!?
Looks like unusual insect fossils!"

"/face2 Did you know? Did you know?
There seems to be rare
insect fossils around here!"

"/face2 Here's a bit of good news!
There seems to be unusual
insect fossils in the area!"

"/face4 There's solid data here and
there... What it is, I don't know!"

"Strange, are there
rocks shaped like
eggs around there?"

"Sensing readings of some
strange material... It's similar
to Darkers, but it feels different."

"/face2 Wow, these stats are totally
amazing! There's a lot of
valuable resources here!"

"/face2 Here and there...! Incredibly
valuable resource data is
coming from everywhere!"

"/face2 These readings are more than
mere rumor! It feels like valuable resources are just lying around!"

"Ambient photon readings!
They're from the ground?"

"Nearby photon readings!
Hm, from the ground, maybe?"

"/face2 Really really strong photon readings!
Looks like they're from the ground!"

"T-this equipment's
still running! Please
do be careful!"

"It looks like the equipment's still
operational! P-please be careful!"

"These readings... running equipment?
S-something might be happening!"

"We caught readings from
targets we want to capture!
Maybe they'll show themselves!"

"Capture target readings confirmed!
This may just be what we're after!"

"Please be on the lookout!
We've got readings from
targets we want to capture!"

"An unidentified heat source?
P-please, be careful!"

"Unidentified readings
confirmed! S-something may
or may not be coming!"

"There's an unidentified
heat source! What
is this, exactly?"
"Have you heard the rumors? Recently there have been more and more sighting of the Lillipans."
"/face6 I wonder how the Lillipans communicate... Maybe there's someone who can talk to them?"
"/face2 The Lillipans are soooo cuuuuuute! I want to be friends with them!"
"The exit's close. I'm getting a lot of readings, so be careful!"
"Yikes! Is that coming from the gate? I'm reading a number of Darkers closing in, too..."
"The exit is near! Get ready, you may have incoming enemies!"
"There!\u3000Those flower-like things scattered all around the coast area! Those are called shell flowers!"
"You'll run into shell flowers on the coast a lot. They can release poison and burst into flames, so be careful!"
"Shell flowers are strange plants, aren't they? How they evolved to be able to spew venom and explode is beyond me."
"It looks like there have been a lot of reports coming in about Lillipan settlements getting attacked recently. I'm worried about them."
"Since this area has water, it must be easier for the Lillipans to live here than other places on the planet."
"Since their settlements are so vulnerable, they have to keep moving, but it looks like they've prepared a lot of different sites."
"The Lillipans are pretty handy. They seem to have made tools out of the junk they've gathered."
"This place sure has a lot of junk, doesn't it? These must be mountains of gold to them!"
"It seems that tons of Lillipans have made their homes here! You'll probably run across them from time to time!"
"/face1 Everyone, it seems that something is coming, in this area..."

"/face1 うーん、このあたりには
原生住民のみなさんにとっての
天敵がいるって聞いたようなー……"

"/face1 あれ、こんなところに
原生住民の反応……ってこれ
なんだか危ない感じかも！"

"/face1 このあたりでは、時々ヘンテコなのが
集まって、ぴちゃっと落ちてくることが
あるみたいですよー。"

"/face1 噂に聞くヘンテコなのって
どのぐらいぬめっとしてるんでしょう。
ちょっと気になりますねー。"

"/face1 な、なんだかヘンな反応があります！
これ、どこからだろ……天井？"

"おやおやっ、近くに
他のアークスさんがいるみたいですよ！
……これ、アークスの反応ですよねぇ？"

"おやおやっ、近くに
他のアークスさんがいるみたいですよ！
……これ、アークスの反応ですよねぇ？"

"近辺にアークスの反応が二つあります。
パーティを組んでいるようですが
少し、反応がヘンな気も……"

"……いえ、気のせいみたいです。
そのまま進行し、可能であれば
協力してあげてください。"
"Variation Test1"
"Variation Test2"
"Variation Test3"
